page.title: 12 POLICE AND COURTS
page.content: Daily calls to the{Police Station number{600-1000,}of which{85}are false alarms. The main crime is shoplifting, averaging{16}arrests on a Friday. In the station there are{6}male cells,{2 female cells and{2}detention centres, {120}policemen work in the main station. In{1984}Bury courts dealt with{15,072 criminal defendants, plus a further {1185}family or domestic cases.{2390 defendants were charged - an increase of{468.}On a typical day in{May 1985, {119}offences wre dealt with. Those in {Court 1}were -{1}malicious wounding,{1 criminal damage,{8}serious theft,{2 assault,{1}possession of offensive weapons,{4}drunken driving,{1 obtaining dangerous drugs &{3}other offences connected with motoring. {B.G.S ( Girls ) Prep.
